A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like: Remove the Finn/Rose pointless subplot from the movie and maybe this is worth a damn. So much potential here absolutely wasted for God knows why. If you're going to build up a movie with plot lines from The Force Awakens\, please ACTUALLY use them and don't completely scrap them in the sequel. For a movie that picks up right where TFA left off\, it feels like a completely different journey to absolutely nowhere.
